title: POLYLINE, monospaced 3x5 vector font
content:
Dear Typophile Forum,  
Please give me your thoughts on this new typeface of mine.  
It's a monospaced 3x5 vector font.  
Best  
/Mårten

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416064250im_/http:/typophile.com/files/141013-Polyline-small_6697.png)

author: mårten

comments.content: Perhaps this post should have been in Critique / Display.

Nicer than OCR-A :-)

And, yes, if you're still working on it and would like some input, the Critique section is the right place.
Thanks Riccardo, can I (or someone else) move the post or should I just repost it?
